import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './App.css'; const App = () => { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('virtual-model'); const [activeStage, setActiveStage] = useState(null); const [isProcessing, setIsProcessing] = useState(false); const [processStep, setProcessStep] = useState(0); const [materials] = useState({ castorOil: { name: 'Castor Oil', color: '#FFD700' }, distilledWater: { name: 'Distilled Water', color: '#87CEEB' }, naoh: { name: 'Sodium Hydroxide', color: '#FF6B6B' }, glycerol: { name: 'Glycerol', color: '#98FB98' }, nacl: { name: 'Sodium Chloride', color: '#F0F8FF' }, nahco3: { name: 'Sodium Bicarbonate', color: '#DDA0DD' } }); const sections = [ { id: 'virtual-model', name: 'Virtual Model', icon: 'ðŸ­' }, { id: 'process-flow', name: 'Process Flow', icon: 'âš—ï¸' }, { id: 'materials', name: 'Raw Materials', icon: 'ðŸ§ª' }, { id: 'equipment', name: 'Equipment', icon: 'âš™ï¸' }, { id: 'quality', name: 'Quality Control', icon: 'âœ…' }, { id: 'safety', name: 'Safety', icon: 'ðŸ›¡ï¸' } ]; const startProcess = () => { setIsProcessing(true); setProcessStep(1); }; const getIngredientFunction = (ingredient) => { const functions = { castorOil: 'Primary fat source for saponification reaction', distilledWater: 'Solvent for dissolving alkali and dilution', naoh: 'Strong alkali catalyst for saponification process', glycerol: 'Moisturizing agent and skin conditioning', nacl: 'Thickening agent and viscosity modifier', nahco3: 'pH buffer and foam stabilizer' }; return functions[ingredient] || 'Chemical ingredient'; }; const getIngredientProperties = (ingredient) => { const properties = { castorOil: 'Viscous liquid, golden color, mild odor', distilledWater: 'Clear, colorless, odorless liquid', naoh: 'White crystalline solid, highly caustic', glycerol: 'Clear, viscous liquid, sweet taste', nacl: 'White crystalline solid, soluble in water', nahco3: 'White powder, mild alkaline properties' }; return properties[ingredient] || 'Standard chemical properties'; }; useEffect(() => { if (isProcessing && processStep < 5) { const timer = setTimeout(() => { setProcessStep(prev => prev + 1); }, 2000); return () => clearTimeout(timer); } else if (processStep >= 5) { setIsProcessing(false); } }, [isProcessing, processStep]); const renderContent = () => { switch(activeSection) { case 'virtual-model': return renderVirtualModel(); case 'process-flow': return

Process Flow Diagram

Detailed process flow documentation...

; case 'materials': return

Raw Materials Specification

Complete material specifications...

; case 'equipment': return

Equipment Details

Technical equipment specifications...

; case 'quality': return

Quality Control Parameters

Quality assurance protocols...

; case 'safety': return

Safety Protocols

Safety guidelines and procedures...

; default: return renderVirtualModel(); } }; const renderVirtualModel = () => (

Raw Material Storage

{Object.entries(materials).map(([key, material]) => (
setActiveStage(key)}>

))}
Main Feed - 2" SS316

}
